item.title: Item turn you into a npc
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Yes and this is suprisingly easy just follow this tutorial

Open Client.java and Search for

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

Under

int targetSlot = 0;
Add
if (wearID == 1641) { // ruby ring to hellcat EntangleDelay = 0; npcId = 3504; isNpc = true; }
This Tells The Server That when you wear ring 1641 to turn you into NPC 3504

You Could Use Any Ring
Just Change

1641

To Any Other Ring you Want
Rings:
1635 = Gold ring

1637 = Sapphire ring

1639 = Emerald ring

1641 = Ruby ring

1643 = Diamond ring

1645 = Dragon Stone ring

Next Search For

public void remove(int wearID, int slot) {
And Under
if (addItem(playerEquipment[slot], playerEquipmentN[slot])) {

Add

if (wearID == 1641) { // ruby ring to hellcat EntangleDelay = 0; npcId = 3504; isNpc = true; }

You can also change what npc you want it to turn you into
just change

3504
to the npc id you want

Read full topic
